body:
`--mode validate` does not support configs with custom dns_resolvers

*Description*:
Running `envoy --mode validate` on a config with custom `dns_resolvers` fails with ` panic: not implemented`

*Repro steps*:
Run `envoy --mode validate -c ./example.yaml --v2-config-only`  with the below yaml.
 on `version: 7241be40a3e1cdb450a8a1feb4f468dd3e695f00/1.7.0-dev/Clean/DEBUG`

*Abbreviated Config*:
```
---
admin:
  access_log_path: /var/log/envoy/admin_access.log
  address:
    socket_address: { address: 127.0.0.1, port_value: 9901 }

static_resources:
  clusters:
    - name: xds_service
      connect_timeout: 5s
      type: STRICT_DNS
      lb_policy: ROUND_ROBIN
      http2_protocol_options: {}
      circuit_breakers: {}
      outlier_detection: {}
      health_checks:
      - timeout: 10s
        interval: 15s
        unhealthy_threshold: 2
        healthy_threshold: 2
        grpc_health_check: { service_name: xds }
      hosts: [socket_address: {address: xds.service.us-west-2.consul, port_value: 4411}]
      dns_resolvers: [socket_address: {address: 127.0.0.1, port_value: 8600}] # Use consul DNS server
```

*Call Stack*:
```
$ bazel-bin/source/exe/envoy-static --mode validate -c ./example.yaml --v2-config-only
[2018-03-22 15:55:32.245][252501][critical][assert] source/server/config_validation/dispatcher.cc:16] panic: not implemented
[2018-03-22 15:55:32.245][252501][critical][backtrace] bazel-out/darwin-fastbuild/bin/source/server/_virtual_includes/backtrace_lib/server/backtrace.h:114] Caught Abort trap: 6, suspect faulting address 0x7fffd1710d42
[2018-03-22 15:55:32.247][252501][critical][backtrace] bazel-out/darwin-fastbuild/bin/source/server/_virtual_includes/backtrace_lib/server/backtrace.h:87] Backtrace obj<envoy-static> thr<0>:
[2018-03-22 15:55:32.247][252501][critical][backtrace] bazel-out/darwin-fastbuild/bin/source/server/_virtual_includes/backtrace_lib/server/backtrace.h:99] thr<0> obj<envoy-static                        0x0000000104568da6 _ZN8backward7details6unwindINS_14StackTraceImplINS_10system_tag10darwin_tagEE8callbackEEEmT_m>
[2018-03-22 15:55:32.247][252501][critical][backtrace] bazel-out/darwin-fastbuild/bin/source/server/_virtual_includes/backtrace_lib/server/backtrace.h:105] thr<0> #0 0x104568da6:
[2018-03-22 15:55:32.247][252501][critical][backtrace] bazel-out/darwin-fastbuild/bin/source/server/_virtual_includes/backtrace_lib/server/backtrace.h:99] thr<0> obj<envoy-static>
[2018-03-22 15:55:32.247][252501][critical][backtrace] bazel-out/darwin-fastbuild/bin/source/server/_virtual_includes/backtrace_lib/server/backtrace.h:105] thr<0> #1 0x104568935: backward::StackTraceImpl<backward::system_tag::darwin_tag>::load_here(unsigned long) + 101
[2018-03-22 15:55:32.247][252501][critical][backtrace] bazel-out/darwin-fastbuild/bin/source/server/_virtual_includes/backtrace_lib/server/backtrace.h:105] thr<0> #2 0x104568731: backward::StackTraceImpl<backward::system_tag::darwin_tag>::load_from(void*, unsigned long) + 49
[2018-03-22 15:55:32.247][252501][critical][backtrace] bazel-out/darwin-fastbuild/bin/source/server/_virtual_includes/backtrace_lib/server/backtrace.h:105] thr<0> #3 0x104566cfe: Envoy::BackwardsTrace::captureFrom(void*) + 46
[2018-03-22 15:55:32.247][252501][critical][backtrace] bazel-out/darwin-fastbuild/bin/source/server/_virtual_includes/backtrace_lib/server/backtrace.h:105] thr<0> #4 0x104566bbf: Envoy::SignalAction::sigHandler(int, __siginfo*, void*) + 143
[2018-03-22 15:55:32.247][252501][critical][backtrace] bazel-out/darwin-fastbuild/bin/source/server/_virtual_includes/backtrace_lib/server/backtrace.h:110] end backtrace thread 0
fish: 'bazel-bin/source/exe/envoy-stat…' terminated by signal SIGABRT (Abort)
```
title: --mode validate does not support cluster configs with custom dns_resolvers
